name: Avicennas Group, Inc.
description: Developer of a dental care platform designed to connect patients with dental care providers. The company's platform offers transparent prices and quality information about all procedures and treatments, enabling patients to book appointments and share medical records with dentists.
one_liner: Developer of a dental care platform designed to connect patients with dental care providers. The company's platform offers transparent prices and quality information about all procedures and treatments, enabling patients to book appointments and share medical records with dentists.
